programme.title: Chef Swap at the Beach: Johnny D’s vs. Winna’s Kitchen
programme.desc: Myrtle Beach’s local restaurants Johnny D’s and Winna’s Kitchen go head-to-head in a Breakfast Chef Swap Challenge

programme.title: Intercambio de Chefs en la Playa: Ciao v Drift
programme.desc: Las cosas se complican cuando Ciao y Drift se enfrentan en un "Desafío de Intercambio de Almuerzos".

programme.title: Epic Idaho
programme.desc: Photographer Chad Case and videographer Jonathan Conti take you on an epic adventure through Idaho.

programme.title: Venturing Out: Park 2 Park
programme.desc: In mile-high alpine forests near Grand Junction, Raheim encourages IT analyst Bill to get back on the bike following an accident that left him with multiple broken bones. They also ride ski lifts, kayak lakes of snowmelt, and sip lavender gin.

programme.title: Venturing Out: Park 2 Park
programme.desc: Touring Delaware, Raheim pushes Tatyanna to her limits above the trees before coming back to the ground to get a little history lesson and a fantastic local brew. And in this episode of firsts, Raheim is on his own to catch some waves.

programme.title: Venturing Out: Park 2 Park
programme.sub-title: Tackling Snow, Sand, & Cold in Southern Utah
programme.desc: Raheim Robinson meets up with his buddy Clark Robinson (and no, they’re not related) to see if their shared passion for outdoor adventures will endure three climates across three Counties in three days.

programme.title: Venturing Out: Park 2 Park
programme.desc: In El Paso, Texas, Raheim coaches new mom and aspiring mountain biker Isabel as she rides rocky desert descents in the Franklin Mountains. Then, Raheim visits an ancient bouldering field, Hueco Tanks, home to wild west graffiti and rock art.

programme.title: Amplify
programme.desc: Singer/songwriter Summer Dean visits her college stomping grounds and discovers it offers more music history than Buddy Holly. Punk rock drummer Phanie Diaz checks out local art in San Antonio and rapper Lou Charles.

programme.title: Amplify
programme.desc: Lou hooks up with keyboardist Patric Johnston while Summer records an original song at a legendary recording studio. Phanie learns about the multicultural history of the accordion aka Texas squeezebox.

programme.title: Amplify
programme.desc: Phanie gets a lesson in the bajo sexto, a 12-stringed guitar, while Lou meets the owner of Houston’s independent record shop Vinal Edge. Summer tries her hand at graffiti art.

programme.title: Amplify
programme.desc: Summer jams with Nathen Rogers and his band, La Croix Boix. Lou gets a tour of Sugarhill Recording Studio and Phanie’s punk band plays alongside the accordion-powered Tex Mex band Piñata Protest.

programme.title: Adventure Cities
programme.desc: Jonathan Thompson explores the adventurous side of St. Petersburg Clearwater, Florida; Charleston, South Carolina; and Juneau, Alaska.

programme.title: Notes from the USA
programme.desc: Musicians Foy Vance and Laetitia Sheriff head to the US to discover some of the country's most iconic cities.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couple's adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm? Or will life's unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: After climbing the Grand Teton, the couple head to Utah where a change of plans has them trading in their climbing shoes for an ATV. They take on Hells Revenge, a 4x4 trail only recommended for extremely experienced drivers...which they are not.

programme.title: United Dates of America
programme.desc: Ruairi, Hardeep, and Luke head south to meet local singles in young and vibrant Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: United Dates of America
programme.desc: Ruairi, Hardeep, and Luke try their luck dating in artsy Providence, Rhode Island.

programme.title: United Dates of America
programme.desc: Ruairi, Hardeep, and Luke set out to meet local singles in outdoorsy Denver, Colorado.

programme.title: One Perfect Day in Kentucky
programme.desc: In "One Perfect Day in Kentucky," BFF’s Kimberly and Elsa bring their shared competitive streak to the Bluegrass State, facing off to find out who can plan the perfect Kentucky day. Each is determined to delight - and outdo - the other with unforgettable experiences that showcase the state's rich culture. Elsa kicks off the competition with a classic Kentucky breakfast, a recipe she learned from top Chef Ouita Michel at her Holly Hill Cooking Studio. Elsa wins the first point, but Kimberly’s ready to up the ante, whisking Elsa away for a thrilling cave kayaking adventure at the Gorge Underground. As they ride the chairlift to the top of the stunning Natural Bridge, the rivalry kicks into high gear and they go head-to-head in a trivia battle. The next surprise – a toast with Kentucky’s own Ale-8 soda , sourced by Kimberly straight from the factory only whets their whistles. At the Keeneland Racetrack they sip some spirit forward Keeneland Breezes while Elsa reveals all she has learned about racehorses from a visit to renowned trainer Mark Simms Jr. ‘s horse barn. A Betologist gives them a quick lesson on wagering and Kimberly’s horse wins the race. At Louisville’s Trouble Bar, Kimberly shares her newfound knowledge of Kentucky bourbon production from a tour and tasting at Castle + Key distillery and makes Elsa One Perfect Drink.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: Today, Jamie is up with his surprise itinerary in Arizona - taking in the Grand Canyon, Tucson, Tombstone and many other adventures in between... But how will the trip go down with the others?!

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: For this episode, Ben’s planned an EPIC 48 hours in Utah, starting in Salt Lake City before venturing down to Zion National Park - but what will the other guys make of his itinerary?

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: This time, Mike’s planned 48 hours in New Mexico... And he's determined to show the guys as much of it as possible!! From the White Sands National Park, to Hatch, Santa Fe, Albuquerque and Taos! How do you think he’ll get on??!

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: Finishing their Four Corners adventure, it’s Barry’s turn, and he’s not exactly known for his organization skills! Watch as he takes the friends from Grand Junction to the Grand Mesa and on to Vail and Boulder... How will the guys judge him, and who will be the overall winner?!

programme.title: Beach Battles
programme.sub-title: Beach Battles: Winchester Bay & Long Beach
programme.desc: High-octane dune racing in Winchester Bay, Oregon, plus high-flying Kitefest fun in Long Beach, Washington.

programme.title: Beach Battles
programme.desc: Paddle into Dog Surfing in Pacifica, California, and get picking at the Crab Derby in Crisfield, Maryland.

programme.title: Ellis Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Ellis Family ventures to the Big Easy, soaking up the culture of New Orleans with jazz, beignets, airboat adventures, and more.

programme.title: Ellis Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Ellis Family road trips to the Grand Canyon and Zion National Park in search of some outdoor fun.

programme.title: Get Out of Town
programme.desc: Jaunt through Zion National Park.

programme.title: Get Out of Town
programme.sub-title: Beyond The Big Apple - New York, New York
programme.desc: From vintage planes to miniature trains, adventure comes in all sizes, just a short drive from New York City.

programme.title: The Main Event
programme.desc: Join hosts Amon Focus and J. Damany Daniel as they dive into the heart of America’s oldest Mardi Gras celebration in Mobile, Alabama.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica head to Virginia Beach where they’re tasked by celebrity chef Cliff Crooks to create the ultimate cheat meal for a local restaurateur. Armed with the power of their taste buds, the dynamic duo checks out the best places to eat, including Oishii Burger, Chick’s Oyster Bar and Klassic Doughnuts, to build an off-the-charts meal of epic portions.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica dive back into Virginia Beach's vibrant food scene to build the ultimate cheat meal for George Culver, the food-loving force behind the popular @iheartfoodvb. From the tropical vibes at Moxy Virginia Beach to the game-filled hangouts at Beachside Social, and the delightful flavors of Oh Mochi, De Rican Chef, and Belvedere South, they pull out all the stops to craft a meal that’s as unforgettable as it is indulgent!

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica head to Galveston, Texas, to create a fiery feast for Concetta, the spice-obsessed owner of Maceo Spice & Import Co. From the coastal vibes at Vida Agave to island-famous eats at The Spot, savory classics at Mario’s Seawall, local favorites at Mosquito Cafe, and indulgent sweets from Pattycakes Bakery, they turn up the heat to craft a cheat meal packed with bold flavors and Galveston flair.

programme.title: Sorted Food Goes Big in Texas
programme.desc: The Sorted guys make it to North Central Texas and take on a round of foodie challenges in the "Big D".

programme.title: Sorted Food Goes Big in Texas
programme.desc: Continuing their culinary adventure in North Central Texas, the guys take on challenges just west of Dallas in Fort Worth.

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Great Stays
programme.desc: Rest your head after a long day driving Route 66. Check in to these great accommodations along the way!

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Scenic Wonders
programme.desc: Mother Nature along the Mother Road. Check out these can’t miss natural wonders on Route 66.

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Roadside Attractions
programme.desc: Route 66 is lined with wonderful and informative attractions. Here are just a few of those must-see stops!

programme.title: Destination Route 66: Delicious Bites
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into these delicious bites from snacks to five star dining on Route 66.

programme.title: America's Treasures: National Parks
programme.desc: A cinematic journey through the awe-inspiring landscapes, historic sites and untamed wilderness of America's most legendary outdoor playgrounds.

programme.title: America's Musical Journey
programme.desc: A cross-country adventure through the musical heritage of America and the cultural cities where America's music was born.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.desc: We bring our imagination to life and sculpt a turtle-themed masterpiece at America's biggest native sand sculpture competition.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.desc: We dive head first into the fascinating legacy of Greek sponge divers in the charming coastal town of Tarpon Springs.

programme.title: Small Town, Big Story
programme.desc: We learn the kite ballet and soar to new heights at the annual kite-festival in the blustery sea-side town of Morro Bay.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: A romantic trip to Colorado takes a windy turn when Jason pushes Tayler, despite her hesitation, to summit Mt. Democrat in 70 mph winds and -19 degree weather.

programme.title: Love On the Rocks
programme.desc: Jason loves mountain biking. Tayler prefers to read a book. Jason is up for any adventure tossed at him. Tayler likes to be a bit more prepared. Will the adventures that await in Arkansas leave the couple questioning if they have anything in common?

programme.title: National Parks Adventure
programme.desc: A team of modern day explorers take an off-trail adventure through the national parks of the USA, showing the awe-inspiring beauty found within America’s most legendary outdoor playgrounds.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: Sound of Revolution: Music as a Voice for Change
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas uncovers the revolutionary spirit woven into the music of St. Croix, where sound has long served as a rallying cry for justice and identity. Through the powerful perspectives of Mada Nile, Ras Attitude, Ras Bach, the Ay-Ay Cultural Dancers, and Kevin Williams, this episode explores how artists have used music to confront oppression, celebrate resilience, and inspire change — from the island’s historic struggles to its modern-day movements.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: Roots & Rhythms: The Foundations of St. Croix Music
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas traces the rich, layered history of St. Croix’s musical roots, uncovering the deep ties to African, European, and indigenous Taíno traditions. Featuring voices like Asta Williams, Willard John, Rashidi Clenance, and Vio International, the episode explores how genres such as quelbe, calypso, and scratch band music were born from the island’s complex past. Through storytelling, performances, and cultural insight, Naydyeyah reveals how the rhythms of resilience and celebration continue to echo through generations.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.sub-title: Amplify USVI: The Global Stage: St. Croix Blowing Up
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas traces the rich, layered history of St. Croix’s musical roots, uncovering the deep ties to African, European, and indigenous Taíno traditions. Featuring voices like Asta Williams, Willard John, Rashidi Clenance, and Vio International, the episode explores how genres such as quelbe, calypso, and scratch band music were born from the island’s complex past. Through storytelling, performances, and cultural insight, Naydyeyah reveals how the rhythms of resilience and celebration continue to echo through generations.

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Eric travels to the mountain towns of Durango and Telluride, Colorado to explore the backcountry by ski, snowshoe, and ice axe.

programme.title: National Parks Adventure
programme.desc: A team of modern day explorers take an off-trail adventure through the national parks of the USA, showing the awe-inspiring beauty found within America’s most legendary outdoor playgrounds.

programme.title: Chef Swap at the Beach Tidal Creek v Bonfire Taqueria
programme.desc: Tidal Creek swaps kitchens with Bonfire Taqueria in a Burger Chef Swap Challenge. Which of these chefs will be able to put their own twist on a burger and walk away with their own Chef Swap Knife?
